item.description:
I just rescued the scientists from the surgical machine and followed them to the hallway outside the containment door. They told me to go ahead of them. I have tried clicking everything and waiting a long time. They just sit there and will not respond to attempts to communicate with them. I read the walk through and it appears they should open the containment door to the lobby. Is this a glitch, or do I just have lazy scientists?
